name: D. Let s Go Hiking
statement:
On a weekend, Qingshan suggests that she and her friend Daniel go
hiking. Unfortunately, they are busy high school students, so they can
only go hiking on scratch paper.A permutation p is written from left to
right on the paper. First Qingshan chooses an integer index x (1
le x
le n) and tells it to Daniel. After that, Daniel chooses another integer
index y (1
le y
le n, y
ne x).The game progresses turn by turn and as usual, Qingshan moves
first. The rules follow: If it is Qingshan’s turn, Qingshan must change
x to such an index x’ that 1
le x’
le n, |x’-x|=1, x’
ne y, and p_{x’}<p_x at the same time. If it is Daniel’s turn, Daniel
must change y to such an index y’ that 1
le y’
le n, |y’-y|=1, y’
ne x, and p_{y’}>p_y at the same time. The person who can’t make her or
his move loses, and the other wins. You, as Qingshan’s fan, are asked to
calculate the number of possible x to make Qingshan win in the case both
players play optimally.
